title: Userstory 1
description: As a user, I want ChatGPT to help me solve problems by providing step-by-step guidance and explanations.

title: Userstory 2
description: As a content creator, I want ChatGPT to help me brainstorm ideas for articles, essays, or stories.

title: Userstory 3
description: As a multilingual user, I want ChatGPT to comprehend and generate text in multiple languages.
